attributes.additional_details:
Maximum refill containers can not exceed 10ml.
Maximum nicotine strength of 20mg.
Maximum tank capacity of 2ml.
Product approvals, Packaging requirements, customer notifications and data reporting.
attributes.background: In May 2017 the Tobacco Products Directive will come into force. This regulation was created in the EU parliament by un-elected officials, voted through by MEP’s and coincided with a massive increase in lobbying spend by tobacco and pharmaceutical industries.
